## InternalContractCaseCoreBehaviour.triggers property

Describes whether the trigger functions for this mock are user `provided`<!-- -->, or whether ContractCase will use the default functions it `generated`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
triggers: 'provided' | 'generated';
```
